bike.description: A6-SL Quarternary-phase custom-butted alloy, hydroformed top and down tube, tapered 1 1/8" - 1.5" head tube. Rear triangle: A6-SL alloy, custom-butted w/ sealed bearing pivots, low-leverage suspended rockers, FSR 80mm (13"-15") 100mm travel (17"-19"), cold-forged dropout w/ CNC'd disc mount and replaceable hanger

components.description: Fox 32 FLOAT Evolution CTD w/ 15mm thru axle, tapered alloy steerer, 80mm travel (13" & 15") 100mm travel (17" & 19")
Shimano Deore, M552 w/ integrated spindle, 42/32/24
Shimano Deore XT, M781 SGS Shadow, 10-speed
Shimano SLX M678 front / M675 rear, 32H Center Lock disc hubs, Sun Inferno 23 rims
Schwalbe Racing Ralph, 26" x 2.1" folding, 67 tpi
Oval M600, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 680mm wide, 15mm rise
Oval M613, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval Womens W600 w/ hollow CrMo rails
Oval M600, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 350mm
